item.title: Razer Green Color
item.description: Razer Green Color I’ve always been fond of the green that Razer uses for their products so the following list is the color in various formats. Hex — #47E10C RGB — rgb(71, 225, 12) HSL — hsl(103, 90%, 46%) HWB — hwb(103, 5%, 12%) CMYX — cmyk(68%, 0%, 95%, 12%) NCOL — Y72, 5%, 12%
